name: Mamãe me mandou dizer
lyrics:
Mamãe me mandou dizer,
mamãe me mandou falar

Mamãe me mandou dizer,
mamãe me mandou falar

Quem não pode com mandinga,
não carrega patuá

Mamãe me mandou dizer,
mamãe me mandou falar

translations.text:
Mom told me to say,
Mom told me to talk

Mom told me to say,
Mom told me to talk

Who can't with mandinga,
does not carry patuá

Mom told me to say,
Mom told me to talk

Anya azt mondta, hogy mondjam:
Anya mondta, hogy beszéljek

Anya azt mondta, hogy mondjam:
Anya mondta, hogy beszéljek

Aki nem tud mandingával,
nem viszi patuát

Anya azt mondta, hogy mondjam:
Anya mondta, hogy beszéljek
